snippet: Donald Trump used money from his own charity to purchase an autographed Tim Tebow helmet and a jersey four years ago during a charity auction for the Susan J. Komen Foundation, The Washington Post reported Friday....
lead_paragraph: Donald Trump used money from his own charity to purchase an autographed Tim Tebow helmet and a jersey four years ago during a charity auction for the Susan J. Komen Foundation, The Washington Post reported Friday.

headline.main: Records: Trump Used Charity Cash for Tim Tebow Memorabilia
headline.print_headline: Records: Trump Used Charity Cash for Tim Tebow Memorabilia
